full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BLO BUR RKYEN BZLOG SER BU'I SGRA DBYANGS KYI MCHOD SBYIN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005B (CES BRJOD CING, ,THAL MO BRDAB GLUD RDZAS SOGS MA LUS PA, @006A *, ,GNOD PHYOGS SU BSKYAL, ,BZLOG PAS 'TSAMS BCOD CING, ,RJES CHOG DKYUS BZHIN BYED, ,THABS DANG SHIS RAB BRTEN 'BREL LA BRTEN PA'I, ,BLO BUR RKYEN BZLOG GLUD SBYIN 'DI KOO SHRI BLO BZANG 'JAM DPAL DANG NYE 'KHOR SLOB SU NI BLOB LDAN RIG GROL SOGS PAS, ,SKUL PHYIR 'DOD LTAR CHOS RJE YI, ,THA SHAL BSKAL BZANG MING CAN GYIS, ,SNGON MED SER BU SGRA DBYANGS KYI LEGS BSHAD BCOS CHUNG 'DI 'SGRAGS PA'I, ,DGE BAS MA GYUR SEMS CAN RNAMS, ,BLO BUR RKYEN DANG BRAL GYUR CIG , ,,'DI LA MKHAS RNAMS THUGS MA 'KHREL, ,BKRA SHIS DPAL BAR BRGYAN DU BYON, ,'PHRAL DU BGYIS PA'I YI GE PA NI AER KHE PI LIG THU YE SHES BLO LDAN NO, ,DGE'O, ,)
